title: Project Starter - Initial Onboarding
description: First-stage discovery to determine project type and common configuration

sections.title: Project Type
sections.description: Determine what kind of project we're building to load the right configuration

questions.question: What type of project are we building?

options.label: Brochure Website
options.description: A static-ish PHP website for small/local businesses

options.label: Complex Website
options.description: A multi-stack website (React/Vue frontend + PHP/Node backend)

options.label: Bespoke Side Project
options.description: A custom project like a game, proof of concept, or experiment

options.label: Other
options.description: Something else - let's discuss and figure it out

sections.title: Project Basics
sections.description: Common information that applies to all project types

questions.question: What slug/identifier should we use? (lowercase, hyphens)
questions.note: Used for folder names, package names, namespaces

questions.question: Brief description of what this project does?
questions.example: A tool that helps users manage their daily tasks efficiently

questions.question: Git repository URL (if it already exists)?
Is there existing code to import or migrate?

followup.question: Where is the existing code located?

sections.title: Deployment
sections.description: Where and how will this project be deployed?

questions.question: Where will this project be deployed?

options.label: Not Deployed / Local Only
options.description: Runs locally or is a library/package

questions.question: Do you want GitHub Actions for CI/CD?
questions.note: Automated testing, linting, and/or deployment on push

notes: Ask questions conversationally, not as a rigid form
If 'other' is selected for project type, have a discussion to understand needs
The project_slug will be used for namespacing - validate it's appropriate
After initial onboarding, load the type-specific onboarding file

IMPORTANT: After discovery, present quality gate selection to user - explain what tools ARE being used and why, AND what tools are NOT being used and why. Wait for user confirmation before proceeding.
